name: places/ChIJCbfUB0lawokRruOHusmNEus
adrFormatAddress: 685 1st Ave., New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Lauren was incredibly patient when planning our covid-era wedding. After nearly 1.5 years of planning, her and her team pulled off our dream destination wedding with logistics that at times felt nearly impossible to pull off. I am forever grateful for the role LLG Events played in our special day!

text.text: Lauren was incredibly patient when planning our covid-era wedding. After nearly 1.5 years of planning, her and her team pulled off our dream destination wedding with logistics that at times felt nearly impossible to pull off. I am forever grateful for the role LLG Events played in our special day!

originalText.text: The LLG team was a pleasure to work with. Lauren and her team were professional, thoughtful and determined to give you the wedding of your dreams. They work with the best of the best vendors and make your choices a lot easier for you. The team really listens to you and makes magic happen. I got married at the New York Public library, which is challenging as nothing is in house. Lauren and team absolutely killed it and it was the most magical day. The team takes care of everything for you and are always there for YOU at the end of the day. They become your closest friends throughout the planning process and I am so grateful for the entire team.

originalText.text: LLG was fantastic and easy to work with throughout our extended planning process. We started working with them in early 2020 and you can guess what happened next. LLG took a delay of an entire year in stride, working to revise all our vendor contracts and protect our interests, and staying in contact with us throughout to ensure we were kept up to date. We were completely new to planning a major event like this but they walked us through the whole process and explained everything thoroughly. We had a few unexpected bumps with vendors and LLG jumped in to push things forward each time. It was great to feel like we were in capable hands and didn't have to worry throughout the process. In the end, our wedding was a magical day that went off without a hitch. We had numerous room setups, multiple photo spot setups, a huge live band with a stage that had to be constructed day-of, and two massive trees of flowers extending over our dining area. LLG coordinated everything expertly and kept the event moving along. We've had many guests reach out to say that this was the best wedding they have ever attended, and LLG deserves a huge slice of the credit there.

originalText.text: Lauren and her team were nothing short than AMAZING!!! I couldn't picture planning my wedding without them. From start to finish they were super attentive, assuring and understood my vision. They truly brought my dream wedding to reality and then some. With COVID we ended up switching the reception from a venue to my parent's backyard... in 3 months as we were not comfortable with restrictions and the unknown at venue. Though it was no easy task LLG made it the easiest transition. Looking back now I couldn't imagine my wedding being held anywhere else and being anywhere near as PERFECT. Lauren truly became a friend in a time of need for us. Their organization and experience in the field made things very smooth and eased my anxiety a lot. When we pulled out of the venue the venue tried changing their story and not giving my deposit back and LLG had a paper trail in emails to back up our story that this was not what was promised. They also helped make sure we didn't miss anything in creating a venue in my parent's backyard! Day of it rained basically all day and I ended up getting a stomach bug and it still was the most perfect day. You would have NEVER known I got sick since they were helping keep things go on smoothly and made sure I was taken care of until I felt better. We also still got as many pictures as we could and made the best of the weather. They were like my guardian angels all day making sure that this wouldn't ruin my perfect day we had planned for a year and a half. Their team constantly checked on me day and night to make sure I was good and made sure everything stuck to the timeline and was positioned right for the photographers. HIRE THEM, truly they are the most talented team, don't know what we would have done without them.

originalText.text: This review is long overdue. I used LLG events as my day of coordination service for my wedding in July 2022. Our planner, Alice was amazing. She was so organized and was able to answer every question I had along the way so that i felt confident heading into the big day. Madison, who supported on the day of was also so incredibly attentive and helpful. All of the wedding party and vendors knew exactly where to go. Everything went smoothly and on time. Even when there were small hiccups on the day (like a trolley arriving with broken air-conditioning, rain during outside photos, and some issues with our first look location), Alice and Madison did not miss a beat. They made sure everything was resolved and even worked their magic to get the first look back on track. I cannot recommend this team highly enough! They made managing 10+ vendors and a 250+ guest list look effortless. These ladies are amazing and I am so thankful to have worked with them!
